about_the_game:
A Vast Fantasy Realm filled with Excitement

Get ready to embark upon an expedition to explore the murky and mystical world brimming with mysteries, adventures and thrill.
Employ your mastery to crush your enemies as you advance towards diverse extraordinary realms through various intense situations and risks that await you.
Experience the joy after accomplishing the ultimate triumph for the good and winning the title of the supreme warrior.

Melee Combat Your Way To The Fantasyland

Create your own destiny. Embody strength and vigor, and sail through the challenges with mythical weapons and armor, fighting and thwarting your foes with swords that give you the satisfaction of victory. Pave your path, combating and battling the evil to receive greater glory.

Lore: An exceptional drama emerged from a moralistic idea

An exceptional story revolving around the moral concept of 'victory of truth and doom of evil', and bringing to reality, the figment of a perfect fantasy kingdom where the heroic soul takes off his crusade of defeating all the enemies, annihilating every evil element and establishing the regime of absolute truth.

Types of enemies on the way

The mysterious world consists of an abundance of diverse enemies such as the fire exhaling beast, the sword combat rival, the jump raider, and the phantom that bring fierce challenges on your way. Fight and conquer the dreadful situations. You've got to use your skills and intellect to win the battles fulfilling your greatest mission.
